main

Class Probability

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Probability

  • public final class Probability
extends java.lang.Object
    This business portion of the program computes the probability of coin tosses. First, it receives the values from the presentation class, and then uses those values to calculate the probability of that event happening. This program contains the business class along with an attached javadoc file.
    Author:
    MAXXtreme

      This variable asks the user how many coin tosses there will be.
